title: ‘Succession’ S3E5: “Retired Janitors of Idaho”
description:
Chris and Andy break down this week’s episode of ‘Succession.’ They talk about this episode feeling similar to the first season of the show (1:00), Shiv continuing to fall out of Logan’s favor (13:31), and Logan going “piss mad” as a plot point (27:19).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Producer: Kaya McMullen
